title_patterns: {number} Secrets {topic} Doesn't Want You to Know
You Won't Believe What Happens When You {action}
What {expert} Doesn't Want You to Know About {topic}
{number} Life-Changing {topic} Hacks You Need to Try
The #1 {topic} Mistake You're Making (And How to Fix It)
{topic}: The Good, the Bad, and the Ugly Truth
Why {topic} is the Key to Unlocking {desirable_outcome}
The Surprising Truth About {topic} That Will Change Everything
hook_patterns: The #1 thing {expert} doesn't want you to know is...
I tried {unconventional_method} and you won't believe what happened
The truth about {controversial_topic} will shock you
What {influencer} doesn't want you to know about {topic}
I spent {amount_of_time} studying {topic} and here's what I found
The one thing {successful_person} does that you don't
You're about to learn the {secret} that will change everything
engagement_baits: What's your favorite {topic} of all time? Let me know in the comments!
Can you guess what happens next? Share your predictions!
What's the most {adjective} thing that's happened to you recently?
Share this video with someone who needs to see it!
Save this video for later and let me know what you think!
scroll_stop_openers: I just discovered a {secret} that will change everything!
You won't believe what happened when I tried {unconventional_method}!
The #1 thing {expert} doesn't want you to know is about to be revealed!
What if I told you that {common_belief} is actually {opposite}?
I spent {amount_of_time} studying {topic} and here's what I found!
The truth about {controversial_topic} will shock you!
I just learned the {secret} to {desirable_outcome} and I'm sharing it with you!
You're about to learn the {skill} that will give you an unfair advantage!
retention_tricks: Use a mix of fast-paced and slow-paced segments
Ask viewers to participate in a challenge or quiz
Use humor and wit to keep viewers engaged
Create a sense of anticipation and suspense
Use storytelling techniques to make the content more relatable
cta_formulas: Take the first step towards {desirable_outcome} by {action}!
